map.string: Copyrights: Libidn: Copyright (C) 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008, 2009 Simon Josefsson. License GPL v3.0. Freealut, libuuid, openal-soft: see copyright and license of the according main packages.
Copyright (C) 2003-04 Jonathan Cohen, Nat Duca, Chris Niski, Johns Hopkins University and David Luebke, Brenden Schubert, University of Virginia
Geometric Level of Detail for OpenGL
The Simple DirectMedia Layer libraries are used for handling input and basic window/GL setup on the Linux client.
Copyright 1998 by the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
Performs DNS requests and name resolves asynchronously. Used with libcurl to keep all HTTP operations async.
A set of portable C++ libraries which provide a wide set of functionality. Used primarily for tokenization.
Library for processing collada file format
Client-side URL transfer library. Handles moving data across the net in many different protocols. Used to GET/POST/PUT/DELETE web resources.
Copyright (c) 1990, 2010 Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
Copyright (C) 2002, 2003 CodeFactory AB / Copyright (C) 2003, 2004 Red Hat, Inc.
Copyright (c) 1998, 1999, 2000 Thai Open Source Software Center Ltd
An XML parser library written in C. It is a stream-oriented parser in which an application registers handlers for things the parser might find in the XML document (like start tags).
OpenSource alternative to OpenGL Utility Toolkit
GLib is a library containing many useful C routines for things such as trees, hashes, and lists.
Copyright (C) 1995-1997 Peter Mattis, Spencer Kimball and Josh MacDonald

Libraries associated with GTK for gui features. atk: interfaces for accessibility; glib: low-level core functionality for using GTK+ and GNOME; pango: layout/rendering of text w/ emphasis on internationalization.
A open source spell check library
Copyright (c) 1991-2011, Thomas G. Lane, Guido Vollbeding
json-cpp library released to Public Domain by Baptiste Lepilleur <blep@users.sourceforge.net>
jsoncpp is an implementation of a JSON (http://json.org) reader and writer in C++.
An open, extensible image format with lossless compression. PNG Reference Library
Generates UUIDs under Linux. Originally a part of the ext2fs filesystem. Also see lluuid.cpp for all platforms. Part of the e2fsprogs package.
Copyright (C) 1999-2007 Brian Paul All Rights Reserved.
Mesa 3-D graphics library. Provides the required Apple OpenGL headers under Linux.
in use on windows and darwin for joystick support.
Ogg: container format Vorbis: audio compression scheme
Copyright 2004-2006 Lennart Poettering, Copyright 2006 Pierre Ossman (ossman@cendio.se) for Cendio AB
Copyright 2002-2006 Vladimir Dyuzhev, Copyright 2007 Denis Kononenko, Copyright 2008 Michal Rzechonek
Implementation of the xmlrpc protocol in C that provides an API for developers to serialize RPC requests to and from XML.
Copyright (C) 1995-2003 Jean-loup Gailly and Mark Adler
A Massively Spiffy Yet Delicately Unobtrusive Compression Library (Also Free, Not to Mention Unencumbered by Patents)
